DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Powder Ultrafine Setting Powder (0.6 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron UltraFine Setting Powder is a finely processed, clump free, setting powder with antiperspirant. It retains the smoothness of your makeup and comes in the traditional Neutral/Translucent or a special Ultra White with white pigment for Whiteface Makeup used by clowns and mimes. Mehron has even made an innovation in the container for this UltraFine Setting Powder. It comes in a convenient shaker container that allows maximum control of quantity used and avoids messy spills. This UltraFine Setting Powder in the shaker container contains 1 oz of setting powder.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 1 oz in a convenient shaker container
